readable.title: 3038045802_93f2cd5fbc
readable.content: A skier doing a high jump from a snowy ramp near a mountain range . A ski jumper enjoys winter fun . A snowboarder flies off of a jump which is next to a big red atomic sign . a snowboarder is up in the air having taken off from a big jump in a tournament . A snowboarder jumps off a large ramp in the mountains .
